programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair) S2 (5/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair»It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice) S2 (8/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice»Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (A la recherche de Mr. Dinosaure) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «A la recherche de Mr. Dinosaure»George's favorite cuddly toy is Mr. Dinosaur. One day Mr. Dinosaur gets stuck in a tree. George thinks he's lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grenouilles, vers et papillons) S1 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Grenouilles, vers et papillons»Peppa and George find frogs, worms and butterflies in Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig's garden and they play with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le château aux 4 vents) S1 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Le château aux 4 vents»Peppa et George s'occupent de Polly le perroquet en l'absence de leurs grands-parents, en vacances. Mais Polly profite de ce que les enfants sont partis chercher une glace pour prendre la poudre d'escampette...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Supermarché) S1 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Le Supermarché»Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques d'eau de mer) S2 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques d'eau de mer»Peppa and George are at the seaside with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Peppa and George like sandy beaches, but this is a different kind of beach, with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. Peppa, George, Granny and Grandpa Pig have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une promenade à vélo) S2 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Une promenade à vélo»Peppa and her family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa rides her little bicycle. Mummy and Daddy Pig ride their tandem, with George on the back. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she's not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa's friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage sur la Lune) S3 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage sur la Lune»Peppa et George partent avec maman Cochon à la présentation par mademoiselle Lapin du camion des mamans sapeurs pompiers...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le mûrier) S3 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le mûrier»Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vétérinaire volante) S4 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La vétérinaire volante»The Flying Vet: Doctor Hamster is having a busy day - there are lots of helpless animals that need her help!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le trésor de pirate) S4 (52/52)
programme.desc: «Le trésor de pirate»Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Bassin aux Poissons) S4 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le Bassin aux Poissons»Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Un trou dans la route) S3 (26/52)
programme.desc: «Un trou dans la route»Peppa et sa famille tentent de se rendre à l'aire de jeux, mais les travaux routiers de monsieur Taureau ne facilitent pas les choses...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les ombres) S4 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Les ombres»Peppa and George notice they have shadows, and no matter how fast they walk, run, or jump - they can't lose them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les animaux nocturnes) S4 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Les animaux nocturnes»Every day is an adventure for Peppa Pig! With her family and friends there's always something to smile about, and a whole world of things to discover!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»La reine va remettre une récompense à mademoiselle Rabbit, la personne la plus travailleuse de tout le pays. Peppa et ses amis décident de l'accompagner.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le hoquet) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le hoquet»George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les nouvelles chaussures) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les nouvelles chaussures»Maman achète à Peppa des chaussures qu'elle ne veut plus quitter. Mais pour jouer dans la boue, elle consent finalement à enfiler une vieille paire de souliers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les crêpes) S1 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Les crêpes»Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le déjeuner) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le déjeuner»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'examen de la vue) S2 (16/52)
programme.desc: «L'examen de la vue»Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. In addition, his father is an optician, so Pedro knows everything about glasses and eyes. According to Pedro, Peppa absolutely needs glasses. To see if that is really the case, Peppa can go to the optician ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le patin à glace) S2 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le patin à glace»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La lessive) S3 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La lessive»Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too - which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La poterie) S3 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La poterie»Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle maison) S4 (2/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle maison»In this episode, Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see the home that he designed and Mr. Bull and his crew are building. They will help Mr. Bull and be surprised when they find out who their new neighbours are.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête foraine) S3 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La fête foraine»La famille va à la fête foraine, mais maman Cochon est en colère quand les gens à la foire lui disent qu'elle ne sera pas en mesure de gagner les prix en compétition.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La plus grande flaque de boue du monde) S3 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La plus grande flaque de boue du monde»Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les clefs perdues) S4 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Les clefs perdues»Peppa and her family go on a trip to a mountain beauty spot, but Daddy Pig accidentally drops the car keys down a very deep drain. He tries to reach the keys with a stick and a fishing rod but he can't, so he enlists the help from Mr. Bull and his road crew.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Snowball Bonanza) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Snowball Bonanza»Snowball Bonanza: Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighbouring town. (S1, ep 15a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Pancakes: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. (S1, ep 4a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the House Guest) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the House Guest»A brand new version of a most familiar bear! A heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le moulin à paroles) S3 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le moulin à paroles»Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster) S3 (29/52)
programme.desc: «La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster»C'est l'anniversaire de Peppa. Tous ses amis sont invités à la fête. Papa Cochon s'apprête à faire un show extraordinaire pour l'occasion.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les amis de Chloé) S3 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Les amis de Chloé»Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Apple Picking) S1 (49/78)
programme.desc: «Apple Picking»The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Talking Flower) S1 (50/78)
programme.desc: «The Talking Flower»Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Raconte-nous un objet, Blue) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Raconte-nous un objet, Blue»Sharpen your pencils, because Josh and Blue are going to SCHOOL! While Blue and her friends go through their school day, we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to share at Show and Tell.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille aide un ami) S2 (15/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille aide un ami»When Marshall decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace) S2 (20/20)
programme.desc: «Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace»Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré»Rammy's tips about focus and meditation come in handy when Mister Staal's Replicator makes donuts rain in Midden Bos. When Kai takes out his Hydropower on an ice cream machine, it turns into an unhinged ice bot!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway) S2 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway»On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma meilleure amie) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Ma meilleure amie»George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La halte-garderie) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «La halte-garderie»Peppa joue dans une pièce de théâtre. Elle est le Petit Chaperon rouge, tandis que Danny, le chien, est le grand méchant loup et Rebecca lapin, la grand-mère...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête de l'école) S1 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La fête de l'école»Peppa and her family go to the street fair at school and do all kinds of things there. Peppa and her friends have their face painted like tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La leçon de danse) S1 (31/52)
programme.desc: «La leçon de danse»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'embouteillage) S2 (13/52)
programme.desc: «L'embouteillage»Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam. They still haven't arrived by the time lunch is ready, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them - in his wheelbarrow. There's enough delicious food for everyone in the traffic jam.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Emilie Eléphant) S2 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Emilie Eléphant»There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La mare aux petits bateaux) S2 (12/52)
programme.desc: «La mare aux petits bateaux»Peppa and George learn that throwing waste away is fun, especially if you can divide it into special bins so that the waste can be reused. So recycle!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vente de charité) S2 (19/52)
programme.desc: «La vente de charité»La garderie de Peppa organise une vente de charité pour réunir de l'argent pour un nouveau toit. Peppa et ses amis donnent chacun un jouet pour la vente...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant) S3 (51/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Journée Internationale) S4 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Journée Internationale»Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le concours d'animaux) S4 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le concours d'animaux»There is a pet competition at playgroup, and everyone has brought in their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but finds it hard to choose the best pet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aquarium) S4 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'aquarium»The Aquarium: Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium. With all the different fish surely Peppa can find a new friend for Goldie?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le retardataire) S4 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le retardataire»The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (En bateau) S4 (43/52)
programme.desc: «En bateau»Going Boating: Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, and have a race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Souvenirs de l'ancien temps) S4 (51/52)
programme.desc: «Souvenirs de l'ancien temps»Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La garderie à domicile) S1 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La garderie à domicile»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La princesse fatiguée) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «La princesse fatiguée»Papa Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a sleepy princess. In the story Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mama Pig is the queen and Papa Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le concours de déguisements) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «Le concours de déguisements»Peppa and George have a party where everyone comes dressed up. Peppa is an elf princess and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to choose which of her friends is dressed up the best.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les marionnettes de Chloé) S1 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Les marionnettes de Chloé»Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mon anniversaire) S1 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Mon anniversaire»It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pièce de théâtre) S1 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La pièce de théâtre»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mystères) S2 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Mystères»Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are watching their favourite television programme: "Detective Potato". Peppa and George want to be famous detectives too. So, Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George try to find him. Using a magnifying glass, Peppa and George follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le coucher) S2 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le coucher»It's nearly time for bed. Peppa and George play outside for a tiny bit more. Then they are called in for their bath. After that, Peppa and George brush their teeth and get into bed, so Daddy Pig can read them a story. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig finally sit down to watch television, but it's been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de George) S2 (26/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de George»C'est l'anniversaire de George. Maman et Papa Cochon lui offrent un jouet brontosaure. Puis ils se rendent au musée afin de voir d'autres spécimens de dinosaures...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit train de Papy Pig) S2 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit train de Papy Pig»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de Papa Pig) S2 (50/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de Papa Pig»Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Princesse Peppa) S3 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Princesse Peppa»Mamie et Papy Cochon viennent pour un dîner avec maman et papa Cochon, mais Peppa et George sont trop fatigués pour aller au lit, jusqu'à ce qu'on leur racontent une histoire...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de Monsieur Fox) S3 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de Monsieur Fox»When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie") S4 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie"»Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit) S4 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit»Peppa and her friends are celebrating Freddy Fox's birthday at Grampy Rabbit's dinosaur themed park. Grampy takes them on a wild adventure and shows them some singing dinosaurs. The gang then follows dinosaur footprints to find a special surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une histoire pour George) S4 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Une histoire pour George»Bedtime Story: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story to help them fall asleep. When George wakes up again Peppa has to make up a bedtime story to get him back to sleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit) S3 (37/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit»Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket - and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le club secret) S3 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le club secret»Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club - going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Roy) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Roy»1.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Lion volant) S4 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Le Lion volant»Blaze and AJ are excited to play with their new friend Roarian, the Flying Lion! But when Roarian loses his magical sunstone, he turns into a statue! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to find the sunstone and restore Roarian's powers!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les robots dans l'espace) S4 (9/20)
programme.desc: «Les robots dans l'espace»When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble»A shipment of plastic is dumped in the Crystal Lake. A lake monster appears and Rammy must overcome his fear of rednessing everyone. When Lola and Mister Steel get stuck together, they are forced to work together.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Lady Monkey Mech) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Lady Monkey Mech»Lady Monkey Mech: Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade so Lady Fluffpot can shop in peace. Can Deer Squad save the parade? (S2, ep 9a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair) S2 (5/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Gets Fit / Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair»It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him! // Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice) S2 (8/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Vegetable Thief / Paddington Takes to the Ice»Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case. // There's an ice rink in the Park & Mr. Gruber teaches Paddington how to skate for the ice disco but will be brave the ice himself again after a fall?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (A la recherche de Mr. Dinosaure) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «A la recherche de Mr. Dinosaure»George's favorite cuddly toy is Mr. Dinosaur. One day Mr. Dinosaur gets stuck in a tree. George thinks he's lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grenouilles, vers et papillons) S1 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Grenouilles, vers et papillons»Peppa and George find frogs, worms and butterflies in Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig's garden and they play with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le château aux 4 vents) S1 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Le château aux 4 vents»Peppa et George s'occupent de Polly le perroquet en l'absence de leurs grands-parents, en vacances. Mais Polly profite de ce que les enfants sont partis chercher une glace pour prendre la poudre d'escampette...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Supermarché) S1 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Le Supermarché»Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques d'eau de mer) S2 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques d'eau de mer»Peppa and George are at the seaside with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Peppa and George like sandy beaches, but this is a different kind of beach, with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. Peppa, George, Granny and Grandpa Pig have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une promenade à vélo) S2 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Une promenade à vélo»Peppa and her family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa rides her little bicycle. Mummy and Daddy Pig ride their tandem, with George on the back. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she's not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa's friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage sur la Lune) S3 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage sur la Lune»Peppa et George partent avec maman Cochon à la présentation par mademoiselle Lapin du camion des mamans sapeurs pompiers...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le mûrier) S3 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le mûrier»Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vétérinaire volante) S4 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La vétérinaire volante»The Flying Vet: Doctor Hamster is having a busy day - there are lots of helpless animals that need her help!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le trésor de pirate) S4 (52/52)
programme.desc: «Le trésor de pirate»Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Bassin aux Poissons) S4 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le Bassin aux Poissons»Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Un trou dans la route) S3 (26/52)
programme.desc: «Un trou dans la route»Peppa et sa famille tentent de se rendre à l'aire de jeux, mais les travaux routiers de monsieur Taureau ne facilitent pas les choses...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les ombres) S4 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Les ombres»Peppa and George notice they have shadows, and no matter how fast they walk, run, or jump - they can't lose them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les animaux nocturnes) S4 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Les animaux nocturnes»Every day is an adventure for Peppa Pig! With her family and friends there's always something to smile about, and a whole world of things to discover!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»La reine va remettre une récompense à mademoiselle Rabbit, la personne la plus travailleuse de tout le pays. Peppa et ses amis décident de l'accompagner.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le hoquet) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le hoquet»George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les nouvelles chaussures) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les nouvelles chaussures»Maman achète à Peppa des chaussures qu'elle ne veut plus quitter. Mais pour jouer dans la boue, elle consent finalement à enfiler une vieille paire de souliers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les crêpes) S1 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Les crêpes»Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le déjeuner) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le déjeuner»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'examen de la vue) S2 (16/52)
programme.desc: «L'examen de la vue»Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. In addition, his father is an optician, so Pedro knows everything about glasses and eyes. According to Pedro, Peppa absolutely needs glasses. To see if that is really the case, Peppa can go to the optician ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le patin à glace) S2 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le patin à glace»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La lessive) S3 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La lessive»Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too - which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La poterie) S3 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La poterie»Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle maison) S4 (2/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle maison»In this episode, Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see the home that he designed and Mr. Bull and his crew are building. They will help Mr. Bull and be surprised when they find out who their new neighbours are.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête foraine) S3 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La fête foraine»La famille va à la fête foraine, mais maman Cochon est en colère quand les gens à la foire lui disent qu'elle ne sera pas en mesure de gagner les prix en compétition.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La plus grande flaque de boue du monde) S3 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La plus grande flaque de boue du monde»Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les clefs perdues) S4 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Les clefs perdues»Peppa and her family go on a trip to a mountain beauty spot, but Daddy Pig accidentally drops the car keys down a very deep drain. He tries to reach the keys with a stick and a fishing rod but he can't, so he enlists the help from Mr. Bull and his road crew.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Snowball Bonanza) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Snowball Bonanza»Snowball Bonanza: Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighbouring town. (S1, ep 15a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Pancakes: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. (S1, ep 4a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the House Guest) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the House Guest»A brand new version of a most familiar bear! A heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le match de basket) S4 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Le match de basket»Peppa and her friends learn to play basketball, and their coach is Daddy Pig. He will teach them the rules- how to bounce the ball, tackling,... and in the end, they will play a game against a bigger, and older team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Dada-Cabriole) S4 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Dada-Cabriole»Peppa and George get a special package from their Aunt Dottie who lives far away, in another country. When Mr Zebra delivers it, Peppa and George will have to share the present and play with it together.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vilaine Tortue) S4 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vilaine Tortue»Tiddles the Tortoise, Doctor Hamster's pet, has got stuck up a tree, again! Who can save him? (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Smile Day) S1 (53/78)
programme.desc: «Smile Day»When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (No Panic !) S1 (54/78)
programme.desc: «No Panic !»Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue fête le printemps) S2 (15/21)
programme.desc: «Blue fête le printemps»It's getting warmer outside, and the flowers are blooming - that must mean that spring is here! We play an outdoors game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do on the first day of spring.

programme.title: Dora l'exploratrice (Dora's World Adventure) S4 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Dora's World Adventure»Dora and Swiper goes around the world in order to retrieve friendship bracelets.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Meteor Mayhem) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Meteor Mayhem»Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick! // When Sir Steel's Slime Machine starts shooting slime everywhere, Bobbi has to pilot the Deer Squad Rescue Carrier to save the city.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler) S2 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler»Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la ferme pédagogique) S2 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la ferme pédagogique»Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Snap Pea Stir-Fry) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Snap Pea Stir-Fry»Snap Pea Stir-Fry: Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own. (S1, ep 5b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papy Rabbit dans l'espace) S4 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Papy Rabbit dans l'espace»Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (The Museum) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «The Museum»Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les flaques de boue) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Les flaques de boue»It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go outside. When the rain stops, Peppa and George get to play one of their favourite games - jumping in muddy puddles! Things get very muddy indeed when Mummy and Daddy Pig join in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parfum) S4 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Le parfum»Peppa and George are visiting Grampa and Granny Pig. Peppa is amazed by Granny Pig's perfume and gets an idea to make her own. She takes a glass of water and starts picking flowers around the garden. George is not impressed with the smell of it. He makes his own perfume that's very unique.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La peinture) S2 (29/52)
programme.desc: «La peinture»Peppa, George et leur père sont dans le jardin et peignent un cerisier quand un groupe de canard passe et marche sur le tableau...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'armoire à jouets) S2 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'armoire à jouets»Peppa and George have so many toys that they no longer fit in their cleaning basket. That's why Mama Pig decides to buy a toy cabinet with the computer. But then the cupboard has to be put together, and Papa Pig is not very handy ... Hajeto!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le sentier de randonnée) S2 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le sentier de randonnée»Suzie Sheep comes to play at Peppa's, together with her invisible friend Leo de Leeuw. Peppa has to get used to it, but soon she is playing Suzie's game, just like Papa and Mama Pig. Only George finds it difficult.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bibliothèque) S3 (4/52)
programme.desc: «La bibliothèque»Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vacances en camping-car) S3 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vacances en camping-car»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le printemps) S3 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le printemps»Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bateau de papi) S1 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le bateau de papi»Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vacances de Polly) S2 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Les vacances de Polly»Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cerf-volant) S1 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le cerf-volant»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les miroirs) S4 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Les miroirs»George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La visite de monsieur Patate) S3 (17/52)
programme.desc: «La visite de monsieur Patate»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Apprendre à siffler) S3 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Apprendre à siffler»Peppa tente d'apprendre à siffler. Elle réalise que tout le monde y parvient sauf elle...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Patata-Parc) S4 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Patata-Parc»Peppa and her family visit a new theme park: Potato City. There they discover that the magic of vegetables never ends. (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !»Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit bateau) S4 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit bateau»The Little Boat: Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's little boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Maman Pig travaille) S1 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Maman Pig travaille»Peppa accidentally crashes Mama Pig's computer. Papa Pig is trying to get it right.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les bulles) S2 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Les bulles»Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île aux pirates) S2 (23/52)
programme.desc: «L'île aux pirates»Peppa et ses amis passent une journée sur le bateau du grand-père de Peppa...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»Fruit: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les avions en papier) S3 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Les avions en papier»Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing - because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le match de basket) S4 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Le match de basket»Peppa and her friends learn to play basketball, and their coach is Daddy Pig. He will teach them the rules- how to bounce the ball, tackling,... and in the end, they will play a game against a bigger, and older team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardinage) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardinage»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les instruments de musique) S1 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Les instruments de musique»Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle voiture) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle voiture»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le lavage de la voiture) S1 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le lavage de la voiture»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le rangement) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Le rangement»Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit) S3 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit»Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Secouer, racler, taper) S3 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Secouer, racler, taper»Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Grass is Always Greener...) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «The Grass is Always Greener...»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sauvetage Royal) S4 (17/20)
programme.desc: «Sauvetage Royal»A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away! To bring him home, Blaze, AJ and the King's adorable pet dragon Zeek must transform into knights in shining armor!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Blaze, policier) S4 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Blaze, policier»Blaze and AJ are joining the police department! With the help of their new police pal, Officer Anna, Blaze transforms into a super-fast police car to lend a helping hand (or tire) to any truck in trouble.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des pingouins dans la jungle / Un cargo en danger) S6 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Des pingouins dans la jungle / Un cargo en danger»An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le concours de melon / La Pat'Patrouille sauve Bettina) S6 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Le concours de melon / La Pat'Patrouille sauve Bettina»Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal»After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. // Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!
